sonic-multiplicities-core

2009 · supercollider

This SC3 codebase is written in pure sclang and has been in active development since 2009. It is the audio analysis and DSP core of the Sonic Multiplicities performance platform, optimized for a dedicated rack-mount linux-rt system with professional audio interface access.

View this project on GitHub.

It is also available as an scide startup file using the new multi-threaded Supernova server.

Technologies Used

  • SuperCollider 3
